dict.acceptation: 〈美〉用过的，用旧了的；习惯于；二手的；精疲力尽的；
使用( use的过去式和过去分词)；常常，经常；

sent.orig: We company sell used excavator, used dozer, used crawler crane, used truck crane, used wheel loader.
sent.trans: 专业从事二手履带吊，二手进口挖掘机，越野起重机，进口推土机，进口装载机经营。

sent.orig: One is used as an attribute; the other is used as a predicative.
sent.trans: 一个当定语用，另一个当表语用。

sent.orig: Model Used-This is the base model used for unit's in-game representation.
sent.trans: 模型-这是基本模型用于单位的在游戏中的代表性。

sent.orig: The genetic engineering technique used in the mice cannot be used in people, he said.
sent.trans: 他说用在老鼠身上的基因工程技术不能用在人身上。

sent.orig: Biomedical fibrin glue was used in treatment group, and routine treatment was used in control group.
sent.trans: 对照组作常规修补，观察组按对照组修补方法完成修补后在修补处喷涂生物蛋白胶。
